The rune defender (t) is a rune defender with a rune defender ornament kit attached to it. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the defender. It is considered a part of the gilded equipment.

The trimmed defender can be dismantled anytime, returning the defender and the tradeable ornament kit. Lorelai will not recognize the rune defender (t) as a rune defender for access to the basement cyclopses.

 Attack bonuses

[[File:Rune defender (t) detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''rune defender (t)''' is a [[rune defender]] with a [[rune defender ornament kit]] attached to it. The attached ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add aesthetics to the defender. It is considered a part of the [[gilded equipment]].

The trimmed defender can be dismantled anytime, returning the defender and the tradeable ornament kit. Lorelai will '''not''' recognize the rune defender (t) as a rune defender for access to the basement cyclopses.
